fields.headline: McCourt ends with a win
fields.bodyText: Graham McCourt ended his training career on a winning note when Dragon Flyer landed the Weatherbys Bank Conditions Stakes at Nottingham yesterday. Dragon Flyer, on whom Steve Drowne put up 1lb overweight, struck the front approaching the final furlong and kept going well to hold off Funfair Wane by half a length. McCourt said: "That's perfect. As a jockey I won on both my first and last rides and also my first runner as a trainer, Lance Armstrong, was a winner - and I rode him too."
